title: 'No words exchanged, just attacked, viciously': 3 killed in 'random' stabbing incidents across New York city
content: A 51-year-old man was arrested in connection with three fatal stabbings that occurred in Manhattan on Monday. The victims, a construction worker, an elderly man fishing, and a woman near the UN headquarters, were seemingly attacked without provocation. The suspect, who may be homeless, was recently involved in other criminal cases.
summary: A 51-year-old man was arrested in connection with three fatal stabbings that occurred in Manhattan on Monday. The victims, a construction worker, an elderly man fishing, and a woman near the UN headquarters, were seemingly attacked without provocation. The suspect, who may be homeless, was recently involved in other criminal cases.

title: 'Vibe is good': Elon Musk, Donald Trump and Robert F Kennedy Jr bond over McDonald's meal
content: Elon Musk dined with Donald Trump, Donald Trump Jr, and RFK Jr on Trump Force One, enjoying a McDonald's meal. The gathering sparked online discussions, particularly regarding RFK Jr's choice of a cheeseburger and Coke, given his stance on healthy eating. The event highlighted the intersection of politics, fast food, and public perception.
summary: Elon Musk dined with Donald Trump, Donald Trump Jr, and RFK Jr on Trump Force One, enjoying a McDonald's meal. The gathering sparked online discussions, particularly regarding RFK Jr's choice of a cheeseburger and Coke, given his stance on healthy eating. The event highlighted the intersection of politics, fast food, and public perception.

title: Vehicles collide outside Chinese school, leaving several children injured
content: Multiple children were injured Tuesday morning outside Yong'an Primary School in Changde, Hunan province, when a vehicle crashed into the school gate. Authorities are still investigating the number of casualties and the circumstances surrounding the crash. This incident follows a recent string of violent attacks targeting students in China, raising concerns about school safety nationwide.
summary: Multiple children were injured Tuesday morning outside Yong'an Primary School in Changde, Hunan province, when a vehicle crashed into the school gate.  Authorities are still investigating the number of casualties and the circumstances surrounding the crash. This incident follows a recent string of violent attacks targeting students in China, raising concerns about school safety nationwide.

title: Trump picks big tech critic who wrote 'Project 2025' chapter to lead FCC
Sweden, Finland urge residents to be ready for war
'Where you going Joe?' Russian media pokes fun at Biden 'wandering off' in Amazon Jungle
content: During his historic visit to the Amazon rainforest, US President Joe Biden emphasized the irreversibility of the clean energy revolution and the urgency of climate action. Biden's visit coincided with the UN climate conference and faced criticism from Russian media, highlighting the global significance of climate change and the political challenges ahead.
summary: During his historic visit to the Amazon rainforest, US President Joe Biden emphasized the irreversibility of the clean energy revolution and the urgency of climate action.  Biden's visit coincided with the UN climate conference and faced criticism from Russian media, highlighting the global significance of climate change and the political challenges ahead.

title: Trump 2.0 looms. So, what does Biden decision mean?
Extortions bleed Pakistan's terror-stalked northwest
content: The Pakistani Taliban (TTP) has established a reign of terror in Pakistan's Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province, operating openly and extorting money from residents. Wealthy individuals are receiving threats demanding exorbitant sums, often delivered through WhatsApp messages from Afghan numbers. Those who refuse to pay face potential attacks, while authorities struggle to track down the perpetrators and provide adequate protection.
summary: The Pakistani Taliban (TTP) has established a reign of terror in Pakistan's Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province, operating openly and extorting money from residents.  Wealthy individuals are receiving threats demanding exorbitant sums, often delivered through WhatsApp messages from Afghan numbers.  Those who refuse to pay face potential attacks, while authorities struggle to track down the perpetrators and provide adequate protection.

title: Bangladesh tribunal to investigators: End probe into Sheikh Hasina case by December 17
UK hunts for PIO man suspected of killing wife
content: An international manhunt is underway for 23-year-old Pankaj Lamba, suspected of murdering his wife, Harshita Brella, in Northamptonshire. Brella's body was found in the boot of an abandoned car in Ilford, East London. Police believe Lamba, who was subject to a domestic violence order, fled the country after the crime.
summary: An international manhunt is underway for 23-year-old Pankaj Lamba, suspected of murdering his wife, Harshita Brella, in Northamptonshire. Brella's body was found in the boot of an abandoned car in Ilford, East London.  Police believe Lamba, who was subject to a domestic violence order, fled the country after the crime.

title: Ukraine: Will hit Russia soon, without warning
Sean Diddy Combs accusers' lawyer sued over alleged extortion plot
content: Tony Buzbee, a lawyer who recently filed lawsuits against Sean "Diddy" Combs, is now facing legal action himself. An anonymous plaintiff connected to Combs has accused Buzbee of extortion, alleging that he threatened to publicize false sexual assault accusations unless financial demands were met. Buzbee denies the allegations, calling them "laughable" and without merit.
summary: Tony Buzbee, a lawyer who recently filed lawsuits against Sean "Diddy" Combs, is now facing legal action himself. An anonymous plaintiff connected to Combs has accused Buzbee of extortion, alleging that he threatened to publicize false sexual assault accusations unless financial demands were met. Buzbee denies the allegations, calling them "laughable" and without merit.

title: Donald Trump picks Sean Duffy to be transportation secretary
content: Former Wisconsin representative and television personality Sean Duffy has been appointed as transportation secretary by US President-elect Donald Trump. Duffy, known for his conservative stance and appearances on Fox News, will leverage his congressional experience to prioritize infrastructure development, transportation safety, and innovation. Trump's selection of Duffy marks his second appointment of a Fox-affiliated figure to his cabinet.
summary: Former Wisconsin representative and television personality Sean Duffy has been appointed as transportation secretary by US President-elect Donald Trump. Duffy, known for his conservative stance and appearances on Fox News, will leverage his congressional experience to prioritize infrastructure development, transportation safety, and innovation. Trump's selection of Duffy marks his second appointment of a Fox-affiliated figure to his cabinet.

title: 'Disgusting but frankly unsurprising': 'Morning Joe' hosts criticised for 'opportunistic' meeting with Donald Trump
content: Joe Scarborough and Mika Brzezinski, hosts of MSNBC's "Morning Joe," are facing backlash from colleagues after meeting with former President Donald Trump. Several MSNBC employees criticised the meeting, calling it opportunistic and an attempt to normalise Trump. Scarborough and Brzezinski defended their actions, saying their goal was to restart communication and gain insights into the current political climate.
summary: Joe Scarborough and Mika Brzezinski, hosts of MSNBC's "Morning Joe," are facing backlash from colleagues after meeting with former President Donald Trump.  Several MSNBC employees criticised the meeting, calling it opportunistic and an attempt to normalise Trump. Scarborough and Brzezinski defended their actions, saying their goal was to restart communication and gain insights into the current political climate.

title: 'Outrageous': Diddy lawyers on materials seized from Sean Comb's jail cell
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs's lawyers are accusing prosecutors of "outrageous government conduct" for raiding Diddy's jail cell and using seized materials in court to argue against his release on bail. Prosecutors allege that Diddy used other inmates' phone accounts to contact witnesses and orchestrate social media campaigns to influence the jury pool, violating jail rules.
summary: Sean "Diddy" Combs's lawyers are accusing prosecutors of "outrageous government conduct" for raiding Diddy's jail cell and using seized materials in court to argue against his release on bail. Prosecutors allege that Diddy used other inmates' phone accounts to contact witnesses and orchestrate social media campaigns to influence the jury pool, violating jail rules.

title: MAGA celebrates 'Trump effect' in Miss Universe contest: 'Had Kamala won...'
content: MAGA supporters are celebrating Denmark's Victoria Kjaer Theilvig's Miss Universe win as a victory against "wokeness" in the aftermath of Donald Trump's win in the US election. “Wokeness is officially over. This is the new Miss Universe,” one X user wrote. "Biological & objectively attractive women are allowed to win beauty pageants again. WE ARE SO BACK," Donald Trump Jr posted on X.
summary: MAGA supporters are celebrating Denmark's Victoria Kjaer Theilvig's Miss Universe win as a victory against "wokeness" in the aftermath of Donald Trump's win in the US election. “Wokeness is officially over. This is the new Miss Universe,” one X user wrote. "Biological & objectively attractive women are allowed to win beauty pageants again. WE ARE SO BACK," Donald Trump Jr posted on X.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy says govt staff are 'in tears' in prospect of 5 days work
content: A reasonable formula to fix the US government would be Milei-style cuts, on steroids, DOGE co-chief Vivek Ramaswamy said hinting at Argentina president Javier Milei's method to reduce government expenditure in which 70000 state jobs were cut. Ramaswamy earlier hinted at a cruel axing of departments that are not contributing anything and where the staff don't even come to the office and have other jobs.
summary: A reasonable formula to fix the US government would be Milei-style cuts, on steroids, DOGE co-chief Vivek Ramaswamy said hinting at Argentina president Javier Milei's method to reduce government expenditure in which 70000 state jobs were cut. Ramaswamy earlier hinted at a cruel axing of departments that are not contributing anything and where the staff don't even come to the office and have other jobs.

title: YouTuber Rosanna Pansino smokes her father's ashes because his dying wish was...
content: YouTuber Rosanna Pansino smoked her late father's ashes and revealed in her video that her father's dying wish was to that his ashes be mixed with soil to grow a marijuana plant. She revealed that she and her mother were sceptical about the wish but now after five years, they fulfilled the dream.
summary: YouTuber Rosanna Pansino smoked her late father's ashes and revealed in her video that her father's dying wish was to that his ashes be mixed with soil to grow a marijuana plant. She revealed that she and her mother were sceptical about the wish but now after five years, they fulfilled the dream.

title: Massive clash between Elon Musk and Trump aide at Mar-a-Lago dinner table. Reason is...
content: ​"At one point during what the sources describe as a 'massive blowup' and a 'huge explosion', Musk accused Epshteyn of leaking details of Trump's transition -- including personnel picks -- to the media. Epshteyn responded by telling Musk that he didn't know what he was talking about," Axios reported adding that Epshteyn had been bristling over Musk questioning the qualification of candidates proposed by Epshteyn.
summary: ​"At one point during what the sources describe as a 'massive blowup' and a 'huge explosion', Musk accused Epshteyn of leaking details of Trump's transition -- including personnel picks -- to the media. Epshteyn responded by telling Musk that he didn't know what he was talking about," Axios reported adding that Epshteyn had been bristling over Musk questioning the qualification of candidates proposed by Epshteyn.

title: Donald Trump reacts to meeting 'Morning Joe' hosts, says he's not looking to destroy people
content: Donald Trump reacted to his interaction with the Morning Joe hosts of MSNBC and said he looks ​forward to such meetings with other media houses too. "I received a call from Joe Scarborough requesting a meeting for him and Mika, and I agreed that it would be a good thing if such meeting took place," Trump said. "Many things were discussed, and I very much appreciated the fact that they wanted to have open communication," he said. "In many ways, it’s too bad that it wasn’t done long ago."
summary: Donald Trump reacted to his interaction with the Morning Joe hosts of MSNBC and said he looks ​forward to such meetings with other media houses too. "I received a call from Joe Scarborough requesting a meeting for him and Mika, and I agreed that it would be a good thing if such meeting took place," Trump said. "Many things were discussed, and I very much appreciated the fact that they wanted to have open communication," he said. "In many ways, it’s too bad that it wasn’t done long ago."
